title: My laptop specs....
body:
Heya!
So I have been playing on a $400 laptop for some time. The specs are
Celeron N2830 CPU
Intel HD Graphics (Bay Trail) (Bought the laptop in 2014)
And I was looking my integrated graphics card on futuremark, and saw that it had a higher mark than the Intel HD 4000 mobile. Im so confused right now, because I was planing to buy a used laptop with a Intel HD 4000, hoping that I would not have to play in the lowest graphics settings.
Thanks

replies.body:
Really? I heard the Intel HD 4000 is better check out these two sites and maybe they help

Baytrail: http://www.notebookcheck.net/Intel-HD-Graphics-Bay-Trail.103037.0.html

4000: http://www.notebookcheck.net/Intel-HD-Graphics-4000.69168.0.html

i can run LoL at 60 fps on high on this

Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3210M CPU @ 2.50GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.5GHz with 
Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000

Even on that website, the results show that Intel HD Graphics Bay Trail is faster in benchmarks. This could be because Intel HD Graphics is 2 years younger than the Intel HD 4000, which would result in faster performance due to technology advancing. I think your laptop runs faster than mine is that you have an i5 and I have a Celeron, running at about 80fps on lowest settings.
